mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `bookhub`.`readinglog`(user_id, book_isbn, start_page, end_page, summary, read_date, read_complete) VALUES (#{userId}, #{bookISBN}, #{startPage}, #{endPage}, #{summary}, #{readDate}, #{readComplete});
mapper.select: SELECT rl.* FROM (SELECT * FROM `bookhub`.`readinglog` WHERE user_id LIKE #{userId}) AS rl JOIN (SELECT user_id, book_ISBN, max(read_date) AS max_read_date, max(end_page) AS max_end_page FROM `bookhub`.`readinglog` WHERE user_id LIKE #{userId} GROUP BY book_ISBN) AS maxrl ON (rl.book_ISBN = maxrl.book_ISBN AND rl.read_date = maxrl.max_read_date AND rl.end_page = maxrl.max_end_page) ORDER BY write_date DESC LIMIT 0, 3
